verbs.description: [ARG0: A federal judge] [V: postponed] [ARG1: a ruling on a request by President Trump and his personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , for a 90-day delay of a lawsuit filed against them by porn star Stormy Daniels] , [ARGM-ADV: noting that Cohen is now the subject of a federal investigation] .

A federal judge postponed a ruling on a request by President Trump and his personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , for a 90-day delay of [ARG1: a lawsuit] [V: filed] [ARG3: against them] [ARG0: by porn star Stormy Daniels] , noting that Cohen is now the subject of a federal investigation .

[ARG0: A federal judge] postponed a ruling on a request by President Trump and his personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , for a 90-day delay of a lawsuit filed against them by porn star Stormy Daniels , [V: noting] [ARG1: that Cohen is now the subject of a federal investigation] .

A federal judge postponed a ruling on a request by President Trump and his personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , for a 90-day delay of a lawsuit filed against them by porn star Stormy Daniels , noting that [ARG1: Cohen] [V: is] [ARGM-TMP: now] [ARG2: the subject of a federal investigation] .
